image_specs.style: clean, flat vector or light semi-realistic; high readability; soft color palette
image_specs.text_policy: no baked-in text; use visual cues only
safety: no logos, brands, or sensitive symbols
no faces in close-up detail; medium shots

global_negative_prompts: brand logos, signage with readable text

assets.prompt_en: Office break area in Japan: two colleagues (gender-neutral, casual-smart) exchange a small wrapped souvenir bag/box with polite body language. Subtle hint of recent travel (small desk calendar with a torii icon or postcard on a board, not readable). Clean composition, no text.
assets.negative_en: text, logos, faces close-up, crowded background

assets.prompt_en: Four-panel storyboard (no text): 1) Person A offers a small gift bag to Person B; 2) Person B smiles and accepts; 3) Person B gestures a question; 4) Person A points to a travel photo or deer icon (Kyoto hint). Clear sequencing arrows or panel frames, clean background.
assets.negative_en: speech text, word balloons, brand signs

assets.prompt_en: Three-panel storyboard (no text): 1) Offer gift; 2) Polite decline with hand gesture and warm smile (diet cue: small salad icon on desk); 3) Alternative suggestion (later). Maintain respectful tone, no text.
Three-panel storyboard (no text): 1) Offer rice cracker box (senbei); 2) Recipient gestures ‘why?’; 3) Giver gestures ‘because family likes it’ with simple heart/family icon cue. No text.
Two-panel storyboard, formal register (no text): 1) Giver bows slightly handing over a neatly wrapped gift; 2) Recipient bows appreciatively. Business-casual attire, minimalistic setting.
Expression card (no text): close-up of two hands passing a small gift bag with a subtle heart icon, clean white background, shadow for depth.
Object study: small Japanese souvenir bag/box on a clean surface, minimal shadows, neutral background. No text.
Small cultural cue: shelf with a couple of regional specialty packages (abstract designs), a minimal Japan outline pin, and a postcard silhouette (unreadable). Clean, modern style.
